mapper.select: SELECT G.id AS gachaId , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.price , G.view_count , G.created_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id WHERE G.id = #{gachaId}
SELECT id AS gachaItemId , name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GACHA SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{gachaId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId}

SELECT T.id AS tradeId , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , U.nickname AS userNickname , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 1) AS fileUrl , T.hope_method , T.hope_location , T.hope_address , T.hope_location_latitude , T.hope_location_longitude , T.created_at FROM TRADE T LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = T.user_id WHERE T.gacha_id = #{gachaId}

SELECT SI.id , GI.id AS gachaItemId , GI.name AS gachaItemName , SI.count , SI.current_count , SI.price , SI.created_at FROM TRADE_SALES_ITEM SI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.id = SI.gacha_item_id WHERE SI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND SI.gacha_id = #{gachaId}
